thread.title: AKA declares his love for B in new song - Channel O TV Online
thread.title_full: AKA declares his love for B in new song - Channel O TV Online

title: AKA declares his love for B in new song - Channel O TV Online
text:
AKA declares his love for B in new song News , Published February 21st, 2017 
AKA dedicates “Caiphus Song” to Bonang. 
It seems AKA really was pulling our leg with THAT tweet about breaking up with Bonang. 
This Tuesday the Supa Mega declared his love for his special someone by finally releasing the single he first debuted at the Idols finale . The track in question is titled “Caiphus Song” and makes for the perfect follow up to the already massive “World Is Yours” single. 
Artwork for the single was created by fellow musician Okmalumkoolkat and speaking on the track AKA remarked, “This is a song very close to my heart. It’s about fighting for a future with the one you love. I decided to call it “Caiphus Song” to honour him and the song “Matswale” which inspired me to write this at this particular point in my life and relationship.” Feb 21, 2017 at 7:35am PST 
Give “Caiphus Song” a listen here . We can’t wait for the video!
